metadata.title: CVE-2021-47104 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:IB/qib: Fix memory leak in qib_user_sdma_queue_pkts()The wrong goto label was used for the error case and missed cleanup of thepkt allocation.Addresses-Coverity-ID: 1493352 ("Resource leak")

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
